name: Tactical Stealth Repair
description: A rogue AI set up in a house on the map has captured the local civilian bots. Your mission is to stop it, either by stealth or gathering an army of soldiers. You can repair broken bots using components, and they will be eager to help. Player mode: WASD to move, left mouse button to shoot. Unit mode: Unit selection like in RTS games. Move camera using mouse or WASD keys. Right click to attack / move with a group of units. To win, find a green square and collect it!
